DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting store sample tissue , blood , urine patient without breast cancer study laboratory may help study cancer . PURPOSE : This research study collect store tissue sample woman without breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Collecting Storing Tissue Samples From Women With Without Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To create database include environmental , demographic , phenotypic , clinical , pathologic , genetic , prognostic factor large cohort woman different stage breast cancer . - To create tissue repository contain DNA , RNA , protein tumor tissue normal tissue , peripheral blood lymphocyte , plasma link frozen and/or paraffin-embedded pathology specimen . OUTLINE : Patients undergo tumor tissue normal tissue sample collection time medically indicate surgery biopsy . Archival tissue may also collect . Patients normal volunteer also undergo blood urine sample collection . A repository tissue , blood , urine sample establish facilitate current future research study learn biologic feature breast cancer development progression . Research study may include molecular pathology study gene protein expression study . Patients ' medical record review approximately 5 year determine test result associate health status . Patients receive result individual testing .
DOC.criteria: Any subject > 18 year age breast lesion suspect cancer know breast cancer lesion ( primary metastatic ) agree donate tissue/body fluid . Collection sample occur : At time breast biopsy surgery benign disease At time breast biopsy surgery suspect breast cancer At time biopsy surgery histologically proven breast cancer stage disease . From archival material In normal volunteer wish donate blood and/or urine allow control population cancer patient compare Subjects sign inform consent study tumor specimens part research project . Patients give permission tumor specimen obtain outside institution molecular analysis . All subject participate protocol willing follow recurrence , relapse death disease .
